attributes.action: Take bottled drinks out of meal deals, or provide alternatives
attributes.additional_details: Sainsbury's, Boots, Tesco, M+S, WhSmith, Coop, Lidl, Aldi - drink, snack, sandwich/ pasta
attributes.background: Plastic waste is a huge problem for the environment, including bottled drinks. In most meal deals, you have to buy a drink, snack and sandwich, meaning customers have to buy a plastic bottle if they want to save money. Shops should remove bottled drinks from meal deals or provide an alternative.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for retailers and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may like to consider signing one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244976
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242388
